channel.title: Dock on Anand Chowdhary
channel.description: Recent content in Dock on Anand Chowdhary

item.title: State of the Dock 2018
item.description: Two months after writing State of the Podcasts, where I talked about my go-to podcasts in 2018, this post is about the apps that find their home on my laptop’s dock. These apps are those I use most often and make me much more productive.
